name: Coop space war
description: This game is an action shooting game. Your job is to kill all the bugs and the final boss. To kill the final boss, you need to shoot it 20 times. This game includes single player and multiplayer game mode. I hope you can also enjoy the game with your friend! Because of the technical problem, the background music we used is from another game called " Thunder fight ” by Tencent. I am so sorry about that the game client is not working at this moment, i will try to fix as soon as possible. However, if u have livecode installed in your computer, this game will work perfectly fine.
